talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta$
To open the way to the Monolith with the relics alone, the Tree of Life has to lose its powers first.
And the easiest way to achieve that would be to disrupt the Conclave.

$Argenta$
Did you say that the ranger over there was poisoned too? The poison wasn't aimed at the forest - it was for the elves.
If the elves are poisoned, there's no way that the Conclave can take place smoothly.

${user_nick}$
What is a Conclave?

$Argenta$
What? Are you an elf? Seriously you don't know?!
And what, you're expecting me to waste my breath explaining it to you?

$Geraint$
Conclave is the succession ceremony for the Elf Queen.
Isn't this common sense for elves?
(Geraint looks at you like you're pathetic)

$Geraint$
Ask that elf over there for more details.
That elf should at least have heard about Conclave.
(Geraint points at Agelia)

$Geraint$
So they are aiming for the Conclave… It's a little troublesome but we should take caution.
Go and observe the Conclave ceremony and tell us if there is any new information.

$Geraint$
(Geraint is looking at the Forest of New Moon.
Looks like he's not interested in talking to you anymore)

$Agelia$
Have you finished talking to Argenta ?
(Talk to Argenta)

$Agelia$
Have you finished talking to Argenta ?
(Talk to Argenta)

$Elf Elder$
We're currently busy with the preparations for the Conclave.
(Finish talking to Argenta)

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
Do you have anything to tell me?
(Finish talking to Argenta)

$Queen Candidate Ellydian$
I'm very excited about the Conclave.
It's an honour for the Conclave to be held in your lifetime. On top of that, I have been chosen as a candidate .
(Finish talking to Argenta)

$Guardian Larde$
The Elder was the Guardian of Pledge for the current Queen Narcilia.
I wish I can lead a worthy life like her.
(Finish talking to Argenta)

$Archer Yuvenciel$
Why are you here....
(Yuvenciel looks confused)

$Argenta$
Don't tell me you want an explanation from me. You're such a nuisance.
Why should I explain elf things to an elf?
(She looks grouchy. Ask Agelia instead)

$Argenta$
I never thought I would meet such a pathetic elf who doesn't even know what Conclave is.
(Geraint doesn't answer you. Ask Agelia.)

$Agelia$
(Agelia stops what she's doing after hearing your question.)

$Agelia${sound:npc_AN_Archer Agelia_qu_9272_01.ogg}
You don't know what Conclave is?
I thought... This is common sense for all the elves.

$Agelia$
No, of course not....
But...

$Agelia$
A skilled ranger need not know everything, but not knowing about the Conclave is a little surprising.

$Agelia$
Conclave is the succession ceremony for the Queen of the Elves.
Current Queen Narcilia is nearing her eternal sleep, so the next queen candidate has to be chosen.

${user_nick}$
The Dragon Followers are aiming to disrupt the Conclave.

$Agelia$
Really? But not even the candidates for the Queen's throne know much about the Conclave procedures.
It's a ceremony not known to many.
It would be difficult for them to do anything to a ceremony that remains unknown to the elves as well.

$Agelia$
Anyway, I thought you were here because you were chosen as the Queen candidate, {user_nick}...
But now I see that you didn't come here for the Conclave?

$Agelia${sound:npc_AN_Archer Agelia_qu_9272_02.ogg}
That's strange. But this must be fate too.
{user_nick} , you will be participating in the Conclave as well.

${user_nick}$
But I didn't even know about Conclave before I came here.
I have no intentions to participate in the ceremony.

$Agelia$
Whether you knew about it or not, you have the pre-requisites for a candidate and you have returned to Anu Arendel at the right moment.
Your whole journey is a path to your Telesia.

$Agelia$
A candidate who has been brought here by Telesia...
Looks like we have a strong candidate with us now.

$Agelia$
Please go to Elf Elder in front of the Tree of Life.
The Conclave starts when those who have the pre-requisites gather in front of the Tree of Life.

$Agelia$
I'm not as good as you, but I'm one of the candidates too.
But still, we do not know how the ceremony is going to take place.
You should talk to the Elder first.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_AN_Elf Elder_qu_9272_01.ogg}
You are {user_nick} .
I heard that you might be joining the Conclave.

${user_nick}$
Is it okay if I participate without notice?

$Elf Elder$
You have been influenced by the humans a lot during your journey.
Our destiny is determined by Telesia.
It's not bound by any structures or order.

$Elf Elder$
First, please take time to get to know the other Queen Candidates.
It would be useful to get to know the next Queen, whoever it may be.

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_AN_Elf Elder_qu_9272_03.ogg}
And please find a Guardian of Pledge who will protect you during the Conclave.
Then the ceremony will be unravelled as time passes.

${user_nick}$
A Guardian of Pledge?

$Elf Elder$
Guardian of Pledge is someone who will join you in your path to Conclave.
Not as a candidate, but as a guardian who guides and protects the candidates...
The wind of fate will let you know who it shall be.

$Elf Elder$
Did you have a good Talk to the other candidates?

$Agelia$
I think it's unnecessary for us to get acquainted. Aren't we quite close already?

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
Hello, {user_nick} .
I've heard a lot about you. I'm glad to meet you in person.
(Lucien gives you a bright smile)

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
I never thought I would one day become a candidate for the Queen.
But now I'm attending the Conclave....
(Queen Candidate Lucien is full of emotions)

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
The last time I met Narcilia was 50 years ago when she came back from the Black Dragon Raid..
Come to think of it, I didn't see her ever since!
Have you ever met the Queen before, {user_nick} ?

${user_nick}$
No I didn't have the chance to meet her yet.

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
Wow~! So even great adventurers like {user_nick} have not met her before.
A mysterious Queen~~ How interesting!
I have so many things I want to ask her....

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
Oh! And do you think that rumour is true? They say that you can feel every single tree in the Forest of New Moon when you become the Queen!
The reason why there are so many monsters around is because Narcilia has grown weak!?

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
And...
(The conversation is getting a little longer than expected. It's time to say goodbye and meet other candidates)

$Archer Yuvenciel$
Don't you have to say hi to the other candidates?
I might just kidnap you if you keep talking to me.
(The conversation might become too long. Go and talk to the other candidates)

$Guardian Larde$
Don't you think the relationship between the Queen Candidates and the Guardian is like that between the elves and the Ancients?
The Guardian of Pledge has to sacrifice himself to protect the Queen Candidate.

$Queen Candidate Ellydian$
My name is Ellydian.
{user_nick}, I heard that you were away in the human towns for a long time.
But you have followed your Telesia here.

${user_nick}$
Well, I'm not sure about that.

$Queen Candidate Ellydian$
I heard that sometimes you can't hear the voices of fate when you stay in the human world for too long.
The current Queen Narcilia also had many worries when she was on her adventure like you.
Come to think of it, your path is very similar to Narcilia's.

$Queen Candidate Ellydian$
Oh, this is my Guardian of Pledge, Larde.
{user_nick} , I hope you can find someone trustworthy too....

$Queen Candidate Lucien$
Indeed~ I knew you wanted to talk to me a little more!
(Seems like the conversation will become too long. Go and meet another candidate)

$Archer Yuvenciel${sound:npc_AN_Yuvenciel_qu_9295_01.ogg}
I never expected to see you again here.

${user_nick}$
How did you come here?

$Archer Yuvenciel$
Of course, I'm here to fulfill my duties as a Guardian of Pledge.
I have witnessed several rounds of Queen's succession already and know about the process better than anyone else. That's why I can become a Guardian of Pledge again.

$Archer Yuvenciel$
But everyone seemed uncomfortable when I arrived.

$Archer Yuvenciel$
Though I left Serenciel when she took the throne, I have successfully protected her until she became the Queen.
I have all the rights to be here.

$Archer Yuvenciel${sound:npc_AN_Yuvenciel_qu_9272_02.ogg}
And if you allow me, I would like to become your Guardian of Pledge.
Until the moment a new Queen is appointed, I will value your life more than mine and protect you at all costs.

${user_nick}$
I still don't trust you.

$Archer Yuvenciel$
I told you about Feder all because you wanted to know, but I guess it wasn't enough to gain your trust.
I'm both an apostle and not an apostle at the same time.
I have a different motive from them.

$Archer Yuvenciel${sound:npc_AN_Yuvenciel_qu_9272_03.ogg}
Don't you think you'll be more comfortable travelling with me than taking the journey with anyone else here?
Just take it as an opportunity to spy on me.

${user_nick}$
(Can I trust Yuvenciel...? I'm not certain)

$Archer Yuvenciel$
Do you have anyone else who can be your Guardian of Pledge here?

${user_nick}$
I don't know.

$Archer Yuvenciel$
The Candidate and the Guardian of Pledge can recognize each other as if bound by fate.
{user_nick} , the reason why you have not found a Guardian of Pledge yet is because I recognized you as my Candidate.

$Archer Yuvenciel${sound:npc_AN_Yuvenciel_qu_9272_04.ogg}
I will take it as you have agreed. It's an honour to be able to protect you.
I would be happy to accept my fate, if it brings me to you.

${user_nick}$
Now what should I do?

$Archer Yuvenciel$
You're like a child who has to be taught everything.
The Elder will show us the way.

$Queen Candidate Ellydian$
{user_nick}, I hope you can find someone you can trust to protect you during the Conclave...
(Look for someone who can become your Guardian of Pledge)

$Elf Elder${sound:npc_AN_Elf Elder_qu_9272_04.ogg}
Have you found a Guardian of Pledge?

${user_nick}$
I've decided to make Yuvenciel my Guardian of Pledge.

$Elf Elder$
Yuvenciel? Do you know what kind of person he is?
(The Elder seems taken aback by your answer)

${user_nick}$
He has helped me out once during my journey.

$Elf Elder$
I see. He was gone for a long time so you wouldn't know, but he created a big trouble in the past. I wasn't sure whether I should accept him.
But he definitely has the pre-requisites to become a Guardian.

$Elf Elder$
But Queen Narcilia said she will accept him.
Though strange it might sound, she said it was part of Telesia.

$Elf Elder$
I even hoped that no candidate would choose him as the Guardian.
But {user_nick} … you have chosen him.

$Elf Elder$
Could the Queen have known about this?
Though there are no regrets for choices made by elves….
You have already made your decision.

$Elf Elder$
Well, maybe it would be better for you to travel with him after all.
Since Yuvenciel seems fond of you, he wouldn't do anything reckless.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Archer Yuvenciel$
When I look into your eyes, I feel as if I've become a child again.
Now, the Elder will show us the path that we should take. Please go and talk to him.

journal.title: Night of the Conclave I
journal.contents:
Argenta said that the Dragon Followers were aiming to disrupt the Conclave. Talk to Argenta.

Anu Arendel - Argenta

journal.title: Night of the Conclave II
journal.contents:
Agelia seems like she would know about the Conclave. Try talking to her.

Anu Arendel - Agelia

journal.title: Night of the Conclave III
journal.contents:
Agelia suggested you to join the Conclave. Follow her to the Tree of Life first.

Anu Arendel - Tree of Life
journal.todo_msg: Look for Elf Elder in front of the Tree of Life.

journal.title: Night of the Conclave IV
journal.contents:
Elf Elder has advised you to talk to the other queen candidates.
Talk to the other elves who have gathered around the Tree of Life.

Anu Arendel - Tree of Life (Queen Candidate Lucien)
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to other queen candidates.

journal.title: Night of the Conclave V
journal.contents:
Elf Elder has advised you to talk to the other queen candidates.
Talk to the other elves who have gathered around the Tree of Life.

Anu Arendel - Tree of Life (Queen Candidate Ellydian)

journal.title: Night of the Conclave V
journal.contents:
You have found Yuvenciel among the participants of the Conclave.
Try talking to him.

Anu Arendel - Tree of Life (Archer Yuvenciel)
journal.todo_msg: You have found Yuvenciel. Talk to him.

journal.title: Night of the Conclave VI
journal.contents:
Yuvenciel has become your Guardian of Pledge. Tell Elf Elder.

Anu Arendel - Anu Arendel (Elf Elder)
journal.todo_msg: You have decided on the Guardian of Pledge. Report to Elf Elder.
